languages.text: В память о старой предводительнице многие пираты в шутку начали поминать Р'иззу, герольда легкой наживы, которой возносили пустяковые молитвы. Со временем то, что казалось скверной забавой, неприличной даже для душегубов, переросло в небольшой, но растущий культ воинов-пустотников, живущих кровавой поживой на торговых путях.

In memory of their old boss, many pirates started mentioning R'yzza, a herald of easy money, in mock prayers. Over time, what had at first seemed like a bad joke, tasteless even for a bunch of thugs, spawned a small but growing cult of void raiders living off the merciless plundering of trade routes.
languages.original_text: В память о старой предводительнице многие пираты в шутку начали поминать Р'иззу, герольда легкой наживы, которой возносили пустяковые молитвы. Со временем то, что казалось скверной забавой, неприличной даже для душегубов, переросло в небольшой, но растущий культ воинов-пустотников, живущих кровавой поживой на торговых путях.

traits.locale_text: In memory of the old boss, many of the pirates started to mention R'yzza, a herald of easy money, in mock prayers. With time, what seemed like an ill joke, tasteless even for a bunch of thugs, turned into a small but growing cult of Voidsmen warriors, living by the merciless preying on trade routes.

In memory of the old boss, many of the pirates started to mention R'yzza, a herald of easy money, in mock prayers. With time, what seemed like an ill joke, tasteless even for a bunch of thugs, turned into a small but growing cult of Voidsmen warriors, living by the merciless preying on trade routes.

In memory of their old boss, many pirates started mentioning R'yzza, a herald of easy money, in mock prayers. With time, what seemed like a bad joke, tasteless even for a bunch of thugs, spawned a small but growing cult of Voidsmen raiders living on the merciless plundering of trade routes.

In memory of their old boss, many pirates started mentioning R'yzza, a herald of easy money, in mock prayers. With time, what seemed like a bad joke, tasteless even for a bunch of thugs, spawned a small but growing cult of Voidsmen raiders living on the merciless plundering of trade routes.

In memory of their old boss, many pirates started mentioning R'yzza, a herald of easy money, in mock prayers. Over time, what had at first seemed like a bad joke, tasteless even for a bunch of thugs, spawned a small but growing cult of void raiders living off the merciless plundering of trade routes.

In memory of their old boss, many pirates started mentioning R'yzza, a herald of easy money, in mock prayers. Over time, what had at first seemed like a bad joke, tasteless even for a bunch of thugs, spawned a small but growing cult of void raiders living off the merciless plundering of trade routes.

languages.text: 为了纪念他们曾经的老板，许多海盗开始虚伪的祷告中提到雷扎，那个被称为“轻松赚钱的先驱”的人。假以时日，这似乎变成了个糟糕的笑话，就算对那些暴徒而言都相当不好笑。不过，这最终催生了一个小型海盗教派，教派规模不断壮大，通过无情掠夺贸易路线为生。
languages.original_text: In memory of their old boss, many pirates started mentioning R'yzza, a herald of easy money, in mock prayers. Over time, what had at first seemed like a bad joke, tasteless even for a bunch of thugs, spawned a small but growing cult of void raiders living off the merciless plundering of trade routes.

traits.locale_text: 为了纪念他们曾经的老板，许多海盗开始虚伪的祷告中提到雷扎，那个被称为“轻松赚钱的先驱”的人。随着时间的推移，这似乎成了一个糟糕的笑话，就算对那些暴徒而言都相当不好笑。不过，这最终催生了一个小型海盗教派，教派规模不断壮大，通过无情掠夺贸易路线为生。

languages.text: In Erinnerung an ihren alten Boss fingen viele Piraten an, in Spottgebeten zu Ryzza zu beten, einer Heroldin des Leichtverdienten Geldes. Was wie ein schlechter Witz wirkte, selbst für Piraten ungewohnt geschmacklos, brachte mit der Zeit tatsächlich einen kleinen, aber wachsenden Kult von räuberischen Raumfahrern hervor, die sich von der gnadenlosen Plünderung von Handelsrouten ernährten.
languages.original_text: In memory of their old boss, many pirates started mentioning R'yzza, a herald of easy money, in mock prayers. Over time, what had at first seemed like a bad joke, tasteless even for a bunch of thugs, spawned a small but growing cult of void raiders living off the merciless plundering of trade routes.

traits.locale_text: In Erinnerung an ihren alten Boss fingen viele Piraten an, in Spottgebeten zu Ryzza zu beten, einer Heroldin des Leichtverdienten Geldes. Was wie ein schlechter Witz wirkte, selbst für Piraten ungewohnt geschmacklos, brachte mit der Zeit tatsächlich einen kleinen, aber wachsenden Kult von räuberischen Raumfahrern hervor, die sich von der gnadenlosen Plünderung von Handelsrouten ernährten.

languages.text: En mémoire de leur ancienne chef, de nombreux pirates commencèrent à remercier R'Yzza, symbole de l'argent facile, lors de leurs prières ironiques. Avec le temps, ce qui n'était qu'une blague d'un goût douteux (même pour certains malfrats) devint un véritable culte pour une bande de cosmomarins qui pillaient impitoyablement les routes commerciales.
languages.original_text: In memory of their old boss, many pirates started mentioning R'yzza, a herald of easy money, in mock prayers. Over time, what had at first seemed like a bad joke, tasteless even for a bunch of thugs, spawned a small but growing cult of void raiders living off the merciless plundering of trade routes.

traits.locale_text: En mémoire de leur ancienne chef, de nombreux pirates commencèrent à remercier R'Yzza, le Héraut de l'argent facile, lors de leurs prières ironiques. Avec le temps, ce qui n'était qu'une vulgaire blague d'un goût douteux (même pour certains malfrats) devint un véritable culte pour une bande de cosmomarins qui pillaient impitoyablement les routes commerciales.

languages.text: En recuerdo a su antigua jefa, muchos piratas empezaron a mencionar a R'yzza, patrona del dinero fácil, en oraciones de broma. Con el tiempo, lo que en un principio parecía no ser más que una gracieta de mal gusto, incluso para una panda de maleantes, acabó por crear un culto minoritario, pero en expansión, de saqueadores del vacío que viven de los asaltos a las rutas comerciales.
languages.original_text: In memory of their old boss, many pirates started mentioning R'yzza, a herald of easy money, in mock prayers. Over time, what had at first seemed like a bad joke, tasteless even for a bunch of thugs, spawned a small but growing cult of void raiders living off the merciless plundering of trade routes.

traits.locale_text: En recuerdo a su antigua jefa, muchos piratas empezaron a mencionar a R'yzza, patrona del dinero fácil, en oraciones de broma. Con el tiempo, lo que parecía no ser más que una gracieta de mal gusto, incluso para una panda de maleantes, acabó por crear un culto minoritario, pero en expansión, de saqueadores del vacío que viven de los asaltos a las rutas comerciales.

languages.text: かつてのボスを偲んで偽りの祈りをする中で、多くの海賊が安易な金儲けの前触れであるルイッツァの名を口にするようになった。時が経つにつれ、当初は凶悪犯の集まりにとしても無味乾燥な悪い冗談のように思えたものが、交易路の無慈悲な略奪を生業とするヴォイドレイダーたちの、小規模ながらもカルト的な教団を生み出した。
languages.original_text: In memory of their old boss, many pirates started mentioning R'yzza, a herald of easy money, in mock prayers. Over time, what had at first seemed like a bad joke, tasteless even for a bunch of thugs, spawned a small but growing cult of void raiders living off the merciless plundering of trade routes.

traits.locale_text: かつてのボスを偲んで偽りの祈りをする中で、多くの海賊が安易な金儲けの前触れであるルイッツァの名を口にするようになった。時が経つにつれ、当初は凶悪犯の集まりにとしても無味乾燥な悪い冗談のように思えたものが、交易路の無慈悲な略奪を生業とするヴォイドレイダーたちの、小規模ながらもカルト的な教団を生み出した。

languages.text: Birçok korsan, eski patronlarının anısına dualarla dalga geçiyor, dualarında kolay para peygamberi R'yzza'dan söz ediyordu. İlk başta serserilere bile yakışmayan bu önemsiz, kötü şaka; küçük ancak giderek büyüyen ve ticaret yollarını acımasızca yağmalayan bir uçsuz baskıncısı tarikatının ortaya çıkmasına sebep oldu.
languages.original_text: In memory of their old boss, many pirates started mentioning R'yzza, a herald of easy money, in mock prayers. Over time, what had at first seemed like a bad joke, tasteless even for a bunch of thugs, spawned a small but growing cult of void raiders living off the merciless plundering of trade routes.

traits.locale_text: Birçok korsan eski patronlarının anısına dualarla dalga geçiyor, kolay para peygamberi R'yzza'dan söz ediyorlardı. İlk başta bir grup serseri için bile uygunsuz olan bu önemsiz kötü şaka, küçük ancak giderek büyüyen bir uçsuz baskıncı tarikatı ortaya çıktı ve ticaret yollarını acımasızca yağmalamaya başladılar.
